text:
Haakon, Crown Prince of Norway (; Haakon Magnus; born 20 July 1973) is the only son and younger child of King Harald V and Queen Sonja and heir apparent to the throne of Norway.
He has an older sister, Princess Märtha Louise. In accordance with Norway's agnatic primogeniture succession, Haakon became crown prince when his father ascended the throne in 1991.
The Skaugum Estate, situated in the area of Semsvannet, is the official residence of the Crown Prince and Crown Princess.
